page.title: 10FIELD TRIPS FROM SCHOOL
page.content: {*}Throughout my school career at Honywood School I went on lots of field trips connected with either the Humanities or Science Departments. Here is a list. {* YEAR 1-science visit to Chalkney {Woods -day trip to Boulogne { YEAR 2-castles at Framlingham and {Orford -Fingringhoe Wick Nature {Reserve -Norwich Cathedral { -Stour Valley to study the {village of Nayland { YEAR 3-Lake District for a week {*}In the fourth and fifth years examination classes started so field trips were limited to pupils taking the relevant courses.I once again visited Chalkney Woods and also Pelham Grid for my biology course.There was also a week-end in the Peak District for geography.
